text: ya 'ayuha aladhin sddaqu allah warasulah waeamiluu bshreh, 'iin tutieuu jamaeat min alyhwd walnsara mmn atahum allah altawrat wal'injyl, ydlwkm, wayulquu 'iilaykum alshshubah fi dynkm; ltrjeu jahdyn lilhaqi baed 'an kuntum muwminin bh, fala tamnwhm ealaa dynkm, wala taqbaluu lahum rayana 'aw mshwrt
